author: Wanda E
title: loved our stay!
text: Your stay the staff were very courteous and helpful they went out of their way to make sure that we had everything we needed to explain to all the amenities they have let us help keep our lives there until we came back where we parked their car would recommend this hotel business or pleasure very very courteous and helpful
